name: Drive (A Little) Safely!
description:
Drive (A Little) Safely:

Use your mouse to move your car and avoid the barriers. Make use of boosts, ramps and items to avoid crashing. There's just one small problem: You keep going faster and faster. What will your high score be when you inevitably crash?

Contains:

  • A campaign with 20 different countries, each with their own type of road.
  • Free play mode where you can aim for a new high score.
  • A total of 25 cars and other vehicles to unlock.
  • 12 achievements, ranging from making a very long jump to crashing into as many barriers as you can.

Controls:

Use the mouse to navigate the menus and move the car. You can use the blue spring item with the left mouse button.

Tips:

Each road, car and weather has their own properties. Your final score depends on which combination you pick. Tougher roads, bigger cars, and having weather on can really boost your score.

Try out many different combinations to find out which play style suits you best. Smaller cars can dodge well, but are likely to accelerate fast or drift when going sideways, while big cars are more likely to crash, but they have better grip and give better bonuses.

1.0.1:

Fixed a performance issue where invisible car effects didn't get deleted.
